channel.title: Jail help pleas! pi

item.title: Jail help pleas! pi
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

i recently added a jail system and when i jail somebody they can still teleport out. i tried adding this in playerassistant.java

if(c.isInJail() - c.teleBlockDelay < c.teleBlockLength) { c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of jail, are you retarded??"); return; }

i tried to add that teleblock thing to it but when i compile it says it cannot be applied here is the error i get

src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:1156: operator - cannot be applied to boolean,long if(c.isInJail() - c.teleBlockDelay < c.teleBlockLength) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

can somebody pleas show me how to make it so people cannot teleport out of jail unles a staff member ::unjail them or they finish the activity required to get out? pleas help me it wouold be greatly appriciated

Read full topic
